title: Stream: Sigur Rós – Valtari
content:
At 19:00 this evening, Sigur Rós will stream their sixth studio album in it’s entirety, both via their own website and the widget below. Valtari is set to be released on 28 May, and has been described by the group as “ambient” “introverted” “floaty” and “minimal”. Previously heard tracks include Dauðalogn, Ekki Mukk and the Record Store Day exclusive Kvistur.

So, whatever you’re supposed to be doing at 19:00 GMT, scrap it, and join us here for what Sigur Rós are dubbing ‘Valtari Hour‘. Tune in and share your thoughts below.

10. Kvistur (Pre-order Bonus Track)
